Name: LU 722 - Zoning, 16th Avenue Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 200062 ZMK)
Title: Resolution disapproving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200062 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 722).

History.Description: This Resolution was Disapproved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Disapproved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 Courier;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, Borough Park Realty, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 22d, eliminating from within an existing R5 District a C2-2 District and changing from an existing R5 District a C4-4A District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of a five-story, approximately 16,000-square-foot commercial office building at 5802, 5804, and 5806 16\super th\nosupersub  Avenue (Block 5502, Lots 38, 39, and 40) in the Borough Park neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community District 12 (ULURP No. C 200062 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on January 15, 2021, its decision dated January 6, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 200063 ZRK (Pre. L.U. No. 723), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on January 26, 2021;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued February 18\super th\nosupersub , 2020 (CEQR No. 20DCP022K) which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (E-565) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:  \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-565) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200062 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council disapproves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\f0 Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on February 25, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr\par
